00020 //**************************************
00021 
00022 #define KGE_PLATFORM_UNKNOWN 0  // Unknown platform
00023 #define KGE_PLATFORM_WINDOWS 1  // Microsoft Windows
00024 #define KGE_PLATFORM_LINUX 2    // Linux OS
00025 #define KGE_PLATFORM_APPLE 3    // Apple MAC-OS
00026 #define KGE_PLATFORM_ANDROID 4  // Android platform
00027 
00028 #define KGE_COMPILER_UNKNOWN 0  // Unknown compiler
00029 #define KGE_COMPILER_MSVC 1             // Microsoft Visual C++
00030 #define KGE_COMPILER_GNUC 2             // GNU C/C++ compilers
00031 #define KGE_COMPILER_BORL 3             // Borland C/C++ compiler
00032 #define KGE_COMPILER_NDK  4             // NDK build system
00033 
00034 #define KGE_ARCHITECTURE_UNKNOWN        // Unknown architecture
00035 #define KGE_ARCHITECTURE_32 1           // 32-bit architecture CPU
00036 #define KGE_ARCHITECTURE_64 2           // 64-bit architecture CPU
00037 
00038 // find compiler type and version
00039 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00040         #define KGE_COMPILER KGE_COMPILER_MSVC
00041         #define KGE_COMP_VER _MSC_VER
00042 
00043 #elif defined( __GNUC__ )
00044         #define KGE_COMPILER KGE_COMPILER_GNUC
00045         #define KGE_COMP_VER (((__GNUC__)*100) + \
00046                         (__GNUC_MINOR__*10) + \
00047                         __GNUC_PATCHLEVEL__)
00048 
00049 #elif defined( __BORLANDC__ )
00050         #define KGE_COMPILER KGE_COMPILER_BORL
00051         #define KGE_COMP_VER __BCPLUSPLUS__
00052 
00053 #elif defined( NDK )
00054         #define KGE_COMPILER KGE_PLATFORM_ANDROID
00055         #define KGE_COMP_VER 7
00056 
00057 #else
00058         #define KGE_COMPILER KGE_COMPILER_UNKNOWN
00059         #pragma error "No known compiler. Compiling Abrot!"
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 // finds the platform
00063 #if defined( __WIN32__ ) || defined( _WIN32 ) || defined(_WIN64)
00064         #define KGE_PLATFORM KGE_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00065 #elif defined( __APPLE_CC__)
00066         #define KGE_PLATFORM KGE_PLATFORM_APPLE
00067 #elif defined(__UNIX__)
00068         #define KGE_PLATFORM KGE_PLATFORM_LINUX
00069 #elif defined(ANDROID)
00070         #define KGE_PLATFORM KGE_PLATFORM_ANDROID
00071 #else
00072         #define KGE_PLATFORM KGE_PLATFORM_UNKNOWN
00073 #endif
00074

00076 #if defined(__x86_x64__) || defined(_M_X64) || defined(__powerpc64__) || defined(__alpha__) || defined(__ia64__) || defined(__s390__) || defined(__s390x__)
00077         #define KGE_ARCHITECTURE_TYPE KGE_ARCHITECTURE_64
00078 #else
00079         #define KGE_ARCHITECTURE_TYPE KGE_ARCHITECTURE_32
00080 #endif
